content.summary: $CONTENT_SUMMARY/Thank you for giving me this opportunity! I am an experienced Software Engineer who is passionate about delivering exceptional user experiences with no compromises on performance. I am extremely quick at making myself comfortable with unfamiliar technologies and adapting them to solve complex problems efficiently.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_VD/Full Stack Engineer
bullets: I am focusing on delivering the best possible user experience, while maintaining exceptional application performance.
Consolidated over 7 microservices into a single, highly efficient **Go** application, improving overall system performance by 40%.
Refactored existing deployment configurations in order to facilitate a cloud to **on-premise compute** migration.
Migrated existing code bases from **MongoDB** to **SQLite** and **libsql**.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_AM/Platform Engineer
bullets: I focused on providing excellent tooling and refactoring a legacy **Python** code base to support AlertMedia's hypergrowth.
Led a comprehensive **Docker Compose** configuration refactor effort, improving developer experience and automating developer onboarding.
Led a migration from **BitBucket** to **CircleCI**, reducing CI/CD pipeline run time from over an hour to 7 minutes.
Developed a release portal, connecting **AWS**, BitBucket, **Slack**, **JIRA**, Confluence, and **Jenkins** into a single cohesive application for production release automation.
Developed **CLI tools** for automating developer stack migrations, developer onboarding, and new service setup.
Developed an advanced BitBucket pipeline runner capable of executing existing pipeline configurations locally using **Docker**.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_KT/Backend Engineer
bullets: I focused on writing high quality, maintainable code allowing our team to ship new features with a very high degree of confidence.
Refactored and maintained an existing **Go** codebase. Contributing a rapidly growing project.
Maintained and expanded **Kubernetes** cluster configurations on **Google Cloud** Platform.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_CP/Full Stack Engineer
bullets: I focused on providing excellent internal tooling, allowing our team to quickly become an industry leader in Customer Support.
Designed and implemented internal tooling in **Svelte** and **Go**, aggregating data from **Salesforce**, **JIRA**, ZenDesk, and **MongoDB** into an industry leading support portal.
Developed performant customer-facing tools and **Chrome extensions**, reducing onboarding times by 40%.
Worked on unique customer implementations of ChiliPiper software in **WordPress**, **HubSpot**, and many more advanced flows.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_MS/Tooling Engineer Intern
bullets: Developed custom tools and Chrome extensions, optimizing workflow organization and efficiency, leading to a 24% improvement in task completion speed.
Wrote detailed documentation for troubleshooting hardware and software issues, reducing ticket resolution time by 13%.
Managed and safeguarded highly confidential information, ensuring compliance with data security protocols.

projects.title: Listik
bullets: A user-friendly application for collaborating on shopping lists.
Listik is designed to be extremely fast and simple, made possible by using **HTMX** and **SQLite**.

projects.title: Feedlr
bullets: Ad-free YouTube frontend alternative with build-in sponsor blocking and zero tracking.
In order to serve a large number of users, this application uses an advanced system of proxies and authentication spoofing to access **Google APIs**.

projects.title: Aftermath
bullets: Highly rated **Discord** Bot for player progress tracking with a beautiful UI.
A custom **2D rendering** engine was developed in order to render a UI into an image, consumable through Discord.

projects.title: Pulley
bullets: User-friendly CLI tool for fast **git** repository management. It is designed to sync a local repository tree with a configuration file.
Pulley is written in **Deno** in order to produce a binary executable, making the application simpler to distribute.
